title: Bug 17703: Edit/Add Task action inconsistency with dialog
description: When executing the 'File > Add Task' action after selecting a Compilation Unit (CU) in the packages view (F1), a different dialog appears compared to executing the same action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
OB: After selecting a CU in the packages view and executing 'File > Add Task', a different dialog appears compared to the one shown when executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
EB: The 'File > Add Task' action when selecting a CU in the packages view should display the same dialog as when executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
SR:
1. Open the packages view.
2. Select a Compilation Unit (CU).
3. Execute 'File > Add Task'.
4. Observe the displayed dialog.
5. Compare it with the dialog shown when executing the same action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
